subject: Steroids
Books and Literature
Baseball
lead_paragraph: About 35 people showed up at a New Jersey bookstore to see Jose Canseco, whose new book, “Vindicated,” claims that he introduced Alex Rodriguez to a steroids supplier.
snippet: About 35 people showed up at a New Jersey bookstore to see Jose Canseco, whose new book, “Vindicated,” claims that he introduced Alex Rodriguez to a steroids supplier.
